gold.user: User requests to retrieve all plans to view their current project management status.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all plans with their details.

gold.user: User submits a request to create a new plan for an upcoming project.
gold.ideal: Successfully creates a new plan and returns the plan details.

gold.user: User wants to fetch details of a specific plan to review its components.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified plan.

gold.user: User updates the existing plan to reflect changes in project scope.
gold.ideal: Successfully updates the plan and returns the updated plan details.

gold.user: User archives a completed plan to keep the workspace organized.
gold.ideal: Successfully archives the plan and confirms the action.

gold.user: User duplicates an existing plan to create a similar project setup.
gold.ideal: Successfully creates a duplicate of the plan and returns the new plan details.

gold.user: User trashes a plan that is no longer needed to declutter the workspace.
gold.ideal: Successfully moves the plan to trash and confirms the action.
